interactions.interactionDetails: Claim reported by the claimant. Recorded basic information about the incident.
Insurance adjuster inspected the damaged vehicle and assessed the extent of the damage.
Estimated the repair cost based on the adjuster's inspection. Provided the claimant with an initial cost estimate.
Claimant submitted additional documents, including repair estimates and police report.
Claim approved for processing. Claimant informed about the approval and next steps.
